description: ~Places a button to the left of the Window List to hide all windows and show the current desktop, credit to Linux Mint, forked from MGSE Window List. Version 4: Updated to work with Favorites menu, fixed icon size, also hides the Activities overview. Placement options are available by editing the extension.js. 'nano ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/show-desktop@l300lvl.tk/extension.js' Fixed for 3.4 thanks to erguille (thanks bro)
name: Show Desktop Button
